data.title: We'll never stay here again..overpriced and rundown
data.text: Very dissapointed with what I payed for and for the service I received...got quoted an online rate of 169$ which they were able to match over the phone however they did not inform us that price was in US and not CAN which made the total alot more than we expected when we checked in. I work in a hotel and I know that we legally have to inform guests of the rate difference....was not worth it! Was run down, rooms were outdated, no refrigerators in room, tv batteries didn't work and the view outside was right into family houses living room. I will not be recommending this hotel to any of my associates or friends EVER! Was a perfect location right beside the PNE but very dissapointed overall with everything

data.title: Great service nice people
data.text: The rooms where clean the service was excellent. Place is a little older but location and service makes up for that. I arrived late at night and after checking in couldn't find my phone they called it from office and helped me look for it in the rain. Then when I might have had to stay longer offered to work with me and give me a better rate, I'd go back tomorrow if in high point

data.title: Old and Tired
data.text: We stayed here while at the Market. Couldn't wait for it to be over. The rooms were sad and tired. Felt completed ripped off by paying $ 239.00 per room (X2). Next time would stay in Greensboro and rent a car.

data.title: older place,but keep up very well
data.text: this place is really a nice hotel.at first I was worried it being downtown. But I never saw any bad stuff GOOD. The parking was tite but the place wasn't full. The room was clean, nice flat screen t v.the bed was very good I sleep great was did my wife. Bath room was clean. Carpet was clean also.no bad smells..plenty of pillows. The people were nice. Next time I am in town I will stay here

data.title: Ripped off and cheated by the owner himself as a result of error made by their staff
data.text: ALthough this place has a good location, close to market, BEWARE! I prepaid by check (required for market) 2 rooms for three occupants over a month prior to Spring 2014 market. To confirm this reservation, I received a fax from ATrium, indicating the days of my tenancy and corresponding amounts due for each night. As they had made an error on this form (initial contact over phone as they had no internet capacity to book market reservation), I re-faxed it back with the correct dates, indicating a Saturday arrival and Tuesday vacation of the rooms. A long story short, they refused to acknowledge their error, even though I provided a copy of the transmission. This resulted in my having to rent another room 10 miles down the road PLUS I received no refund of the room they claim I reserved for Tuesday night, despite my vacation of said room, as previously communicated BOTH verbally and via fax (I have the records and presented to them). In short, their error resulted in me incurring an $800+ loss PLUS Mr. PAtel had the gall to call me a liar in front of my employees, when it was he who was at fault and yet refused to remedy the error of his staff member. He's a greedy, rude innkeeper that will never see my business again..... good luck if you choose this lame motel.
